rows.label: bf03380100_0020
rows.name:
Hey, don't be shy.
You heard everything we said, didn't you?

rows.label: bf03380100_0030
rows.name:
Can you...
Can you really help Grandpa?

rows.label: bf03380100_0050
rows.name:
We can help. That is, if you can help us.
Can you do that, for your grandfather?
